5449.verse: يَهْدِىٓ|It guides|78|86|1270$إِلَى|to|53|70|118$ٱلرُّشْدِ|the right way,|114|131|6834$فَـَٔـامَنَّا|so we believe|110|127|3616$بِهِۦ‌ۖ|in it,|52|69|204$وَلَن|and never|86|103|229$نُّشْرِكَ|we will associate|132|140|2967$بِرَبِّنَآ|with our Lord|107|360|11527$أَحَدًا|anyone.|73|326|4849$

5451.verse: وَأَنَّهُۥ|And that he|99|118|7215$كَانَ|used|57|95|913$يَقُولُ|(to) speak -|101|139|77$سَفِيهُنَا|the foolish among us|157|195|17403$عَلَى|against|68|106|52$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|72|606$شَطَطًا|an excessive transgression.|203|203|10638$

5453.verse: وَأَنَّهُۥ|And that|78|85|7215$كَانَ|(there) were|104|118|913$رِجَالٌ|men|76|90|6420$مِّنَ|among|63|77|156$ٱلْإِنسِ|mankind|75|89|5952$يَعُوذُونَ|who sought refuge|144|158|17406$بِرِجَالٍ|in (the) men|102|109|17407$مِّنَ|from|50|98|156$ٱلْجِنِّ|the jinn,|75|170|6030$فَزَادُوهُمْ|so they increased them|176|271|17408$رَهَقًا|(in) burden.|98|146|17409$

5455.verse: وَأَنَّا|And that we|102|113|17404$لَمَسْنَا|sought to touch|127|148|17411$ٱلسَّمَآءَ|the heaven|95|116|5426$فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا|but we found it|122|143|17412$مُلِئَتْ|filled (with)|95|116|17413$حَرَسًا|guards|77|88|17414$شَدِيدًا|severe,|74|313|2934$وَشُهُبًا|and flaming fires.|133|372|17415$

5458.verse: وَأَنَّا|And that|78|87|17404$مِنَّا|among us|83|101|1169$ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ|(are) the righteous|146|164|6962$وَمِنَّا|and among us|112|130|17424$دُونَ ذَٲلِكَ‌ۖ|(are) other than that.|166|184|17425$كُنَّا|We|48|57|4361$طَرَآئِقَ|(are on) ways|113|354|12240$قِدَدًا|different.|81|322|17426$

5459.verse: وَأَنَّا|And that we|102|109|17404$ظَنَنَّآ|[we] have become certain|195|208|17405$أَن|that|48|61|655$لَّن|never|57|70|524$نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ|we will cause failure to Allah|208|221|17427$فِى|in|48|55|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|135|100$وَلَن|and never|86|172|229$نُّعْجِزَهُۥ|we can escape Him|148|234|17428$هَرَبًا|(by) flight.|91|134|17429$

5460.verse: وَأَنَّا|And that|78|90|17404$لَمَّا|when|55|80|3471$سَمِعْنَا|we heard|81|106|882$ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ|the Guidance|107|132|1113$ءَامَنَّا|we believed|98|123|78$بِهِۦ‌ۖ|in it.|52|77|204$فَمَن|And whoever|106|118|402$يُؤْمِنۢ|believes|73|81|11685$بِرَبِّهِۦ|in his Lord,|92|108|17430$فَلَا|then not|77|93|208$يَخَافُ|he will fear|92|108|11645$بَخْسًا|any loss|74|90|17431$وَلَا|and not|71|87|25$رَهَقًا|any burden.|99|107|17409$

5448.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.

5449.verse: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

5450.verse: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

5451.verse: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.

5452.verse: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.

5453.verse: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.

5454.verse: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].

5455.verse: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

5456.verse: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

5457.verse: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

5458.verse: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

5459.verse: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

5460.verse: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
